title: Crate boundary refactor: split beads-rs into workspace DAG

description:
**Problem**
Replay silently truncates a corrupted tail and drops ReplayStats; operators never see wal_tail_truncated even though the registry expects it.

**Where**
- src/daemon/wal/replay.rs: scan_segment sets truncated=true and truncates tail
- src/daemon/store_runtime.rs: open(...) discards ReplayStats

**Design**
- Emit wal_tail_truncated (retryable=true) when tail repair occurs, with details {namespace, segment, offset}.
- Surface ReplayStats to callers (StoreRuntime::open) so IPC can report the repair.

**Acceptance**
- Tail truncation emits a realtime error payload with details.
- StoreRuntime open path exposes replay stats for operator visibility.

**Files**
- src/daemon/wal/replay.rs
- src/daemon/store_runtime.rs
- src/daemon/ipc.rs
title: WAL replay: surface wal_tail_truncated repairs
